sentences.sentence: It is one of the biggest grossing movies of all time.
sentences.translation: 这是票房收入创历史之最的影片之一。

sentences.sentence: The movie, which cost $137 million, tanked, grossing only $32 million.
sentences.translation: 这部电影，花了1.37亿美元，表现得很糟糕，票房总收入只有3200万美元。

sentences.sentence: The Pixar sequel, like second highest-grossing title Alice in Wonderland, was one of several hit movies released in 3D.
sentences.translation: 皮克斯续集，就像票房第二高的《爱丽丝梦游仙境》一样，是几部 3D 电影中的热门之一。
